name: @waylay/netatmoWeatherStation
description:
Netatmo Weather station 
Go to https://dev.netatmo.com/dev/createapp and create an app
add these global settings:
NETATMO_CLIENT_ID
NETATMO_CLIENT_SECRET

We suggest to not use your main account but to share your account to a waylay specific user with less rights (cog button -> invite station guest)

Provide username and password on the sensor level or globally using
NETATMO_USERNAME
NETATMO_PASSWORD

Set the moduleName to the device name you want to get data from
author: francisdb
